reason.tex:
%text Remember \[ \sin^{-1} (\sin x) \neq \dfrac{1}{\sin}\cdot \sin x\]. Similarly \[ \tan^{-1}(\tan x) \neq\dfrac{1}{\tan}\cdot\tan x\]. The above statements are meaningless. The ones below are, however, true and follow \underline\text{straight from the definition}.
% \begin{align} \sin^{-1}(\sin x) &= x \\ \cos^{-1}(\cos x) &= x \\ \tan^{-1}(\tan x) &= x \\ \csc^{-1}(\csc x) &= x \\ \sec^{-1}(\sec x) &= x \\ \cot^{-1}(\cot x) &= x \end{align}
